title: Welding Service Management Website
description: A full MERN stack welding service platform featuring service listings, real-time updates, admin management, and a clean Tailwind-powered UI. Includes an admin dashboard for editing services, managing projects, and updating content dynamically.

title: Netflix Clone
description: A responsive Netflix clone built with modern web technologies, featuring a sleek UI and real-time movie data.

title: Admin User Task
description: A task management dashboard for admins and users with role-based access and real-time updates.
